From: "Samir Duran" <1641coburn@...>

::Triggerhappy/Hell Drak::

Triggerhappy was hit by 2 of the energy blasts, and slightly lost altitude.

"Hey you-ERRGH," he yelled, as Hell Drak jumped onto the windshield.

With her good claws and talons, and being an elite bot sent down to Earth
with her brother, she had a good grip, and was debating on whether she
should make Triggerhappy crash, or do something else, which she didn't know.

"You're going down, punk!  Literally!" she yelled.

Hell Drak moved up, and fired a lazer disc at the right wing.  Triggerhappy
was spiraling and moving all around, but Hell Drak held on tight.
Triggerhappy's wing was farely damaged, and now Triggerhappy had lost
balance, and was now losing altitude because of lack of balance.  Hell Drak
was beginning to get annoyed because Lurker is failing to use pronouns, so I
will use them now.  Hell Drak held onto the end, and she was trying to bring
the Decepticon downwards.  If Blowpipe tried to interfere, he would be
toast.  Hell Drak brought Triggerhappy down, but then, he transformed to
robot mode, and so it looked like Hell Drak was humping him or something.
Triggerhappy shoved her onto the ground, then he grabbed her throat, and put
his gun to her head, ready to shoot......

<AzureBlade, this is your queue!>
----- Original Message -----
From: <wingedwarrior41@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, October 08, 2001 10:39 PM
Subject: Re: Attack!


> AzureBlade:
> Let's make a bet, lady (to Hell drak). The first one to get his head
> wins.
>
> He transforms to his dragon mode and stated chasing Triggerhappy,
> blasting 4 energy balls at the bot.
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Samir Duran" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> > ::Triggerhappy(Blowpipe)/Hell Drak/Necromancer/Surgital/Cutthroat/::
> >
> > Triggerhappy saw the shots coming from Orion and Sideswipe.  So did
> > Blowpipe, and Blowpipe rolled to the side and fired two lazer shots
> at
> > Orion.  Triggerhappy was met by Orion and Sideswipe's shots.
> >
> > "Oh, slag it, I'm gonna ki-" Triggerhappy stopped, "AAIIEEE!"
> >
> > Triggerhappy gets a not-so-warm welcome from AzureBlade's plasma
> shots, and
> > Triggerhappy stumbled forward.
> >
> > "Cheeeaaappppp shhhooottttt!!!!  RAAAHH!" Triggerhappy yelled.
> >
> > Triggerhappy's bad day got worse.  Necromancer appeared beside
> Orion, and
> > Hell Drak appeared by AzureBlade.
> >
> > "Hey, let's f*** up this creep!" Hell Drak said to AzureBlade.
> >
> > "Decepticon enemy, this is your last chance to surr-" Before
> Necromancer
> > could finish, Triggerhappy had transformed into jet mode, and flew
> up and
> > fired a photon shot from his right cannon at Necromancer.
> >
> > "Attack," Necromancer yelled, "For the Maximals!"
> >
> > Necromancer fired 3 lazer discs at Triggerhappy.  Hell Drak fired
> two shots
> > at Blowpipe, but Necromancer's shots missed, and so did Hell Drak's,
> because
> > Triggerhappy swooped down, cockpit open, and Blowpipe jumped in, and
> > Triggerhappy went back up and closed the cockpit.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Surgital ignored Alpha Dolphy, he fired a saw blade at Ice.  Then,
> he turned
> > around, and fired a big energon net down at Orion and Sideswipe.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Cutthroat saw them attacking, and transformed to creature mode, then
> flew
> > over and began trying to keep violently lash out with beak, wings
> and talons
> > at Orion, trying to rip him to pieces.
>
